snippet.title: ANONYMOUS;CODE Release date and English voiceover reveal | Nintendo Switch, PS4 and Steam
snippet.description:
The latest installment to the Science Adventure Series from MAGES., ANONYMOUS;CODE will release on September 8, 2023, for Nintendo Switch™, PlayStation®4, and on Steam® in North America, and Europe. 

ANONYMOUS;CODE will be the first game in the Science Adventure Series to include both English and Japanese voice options. Spike Chunsoft, Inc. has put together a stellar group of voice talent including Max Mittelman, Anairis Quiñones (AI: The Somnium Files - nirvanA Initiative English VA for Tama), and Yung-I Chang (AI: The Somnium Files - nirvanA Initiative English VA for Lien).

To pre-order ANONYMOUS;CODE SteelBook Launch Edition:
https://www.spike-chunsoft.com/anonymouscode/ for retailers.

Add ANONYMOUS;CODE to your wish list at:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2291020
PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/concept/234115
Nintendo eShop page available soon. 

#anonymouscode #SciADV
